name: 2D Shooter Tutorial (mehtadak)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project. 

The modifications I would like to make are:

1. Changing the main menu to match the style of the game

2. Making an additional level with a different world setting

3. Make a cutscene between the levels

4. Include some of my own assets in the game
